DOCNAME: CASE OF VRIONI AND OTHERS v. ALBANIA
CONCLUSION: Pecuniary and non-pecuniary damage - award (Article 41 - Non-pecuniary damage;Pecuniary damage;Just satisfaction)
JUDGES: David Thór Björgvinsson;Lech Garlicki;Ledi Bianku;Mihai Poalelungi;Nicolas Bratza
TEXT: CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE ORG ( PERSON i GPE dhe PERSON Pronave – “ the Commission ” ) , recognised the applicants ' title to CARDINAL plots of land measuring QUANTITY . m and QUANTITY , respectively . ORG held that it was impossible for the applicants to have the whole of the original plot of land allocated to them . It decided to restore to the applicants a vacant plot of land ( një truall i lirë ) measuring QUANTITY m. , which was situated within the grounds occupied by ORG , and ordered the authorities to pay compensation in respect of a plot of land measuring QUANTITY m. Moreover , it ordered that the applicants ' title to the property be entered in ORG .

CARDINAL . The applicants lodged a civil action in view of their impossibility to recover the plot of QUANTITY m. By virtue of ORG decision of DATE it was decided that the applicants should receive compensation in lieu of the original property in CARDINAL of the forms provided for by law in respect of the plot of land measuring QUANTITY m. ORG found that , in so far as that plot of land was an integral part of ORG LOC , it could not be considered vacant and thus recoverable by the applicants . This decision was upheld by ORG on DATE . Consequently , the applicants were to receive compensation in accordance with LAW for the totality of the CARDINAL sq . m. of land ( see § § CARDINAL of the principal judgment ) .
CARDINAL . Further details are set out in the principal judgment .

CARDINAL . The CARDINAL Act contained the criteria to be employed for assessing the financial compensation to be awarded to former landowners . According to LAW , GPE was to be divided into CARDINAL zones A , B and C. The price reference for the property located in zone A was fixed at CARDINAL NORP leks ( ALL ) per square metre .

CARDINAL . By virtue of CARDINAL decisions , CARDINAL of which were adopted in DATE and CARDINAL in DATE , the ORG approved and issued property valuation maps as listed above . The maps , which were to be used in the determination of the award of financial compensation by the competent authorities , included the reference price per square CARDINAL throughout the country .

CARDINAL . NORP The first decision fixed the price of land for the regions of GPE , PERSON , PERSON and ORG ; the second decision fixed the price of land for the regions of ORG , PERSON , PERSON and PERSON ; the third decision fixed the price of land for the regions of ORG , PERSON , ORG , PERSON and GPE . The fourth decision contained an updated price list for certain cities . According to that decision , the reference price per square metre for the area in which the applicants ' property was located was valued at CARDINAL .
